definitions.definition: A Titan , son of Iapetus and Clymene , he had three brothers: Atlas , Prometheus and Epimetheus . He joined Cronus and the Titans in their unsuccessful war against the Olympian gods. Zeus killed him with a thunderbolt and sent him down to Tartarus .
One of Hades ' shepherds on Erythea. He told Geryon when Heracles stole Geryon's herd.
Father of Patroclus and son of Actor. (Iliad, XI, 765)

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) A Titan , son of Iapetus and Clymene , he had three brothers: Atlas , Prometheus and Epimetheus . He joined Cronus and the Titans in their unsuccessful war against the Olympian gods. Zeus killed him with a thunderbolt and sent him down to Tartarus .
secondary_definitions: ( Greek mythology ) One of Hades ' shepherds on Erythea. He told Geryon when Heracles stole Geryon's herd.
( Greek mythology ) Father of Patroclus and son of Actor. (Iliad, XI, 765)
